## blockRendering.PathObject.applyColour() method

Apply the stored colours to the block's path, taking into account whether the paths belong to a shadow block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
applyColour(block: BlockSvg): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg_class.md) | The source block. |

**Returns:**

void
